The following items reflect in the Financial Statements : (i) Depreciation : Rs. 2.00 lacs (ii) Cash Flow Statement (iii) Prepaid Insurance Rs 10.00 lacs (iv) Provision for Warranty Claims : Rs.15.00 Lacs Select which of the above relate to the concept of accrual and explain your reason for selection.
